plugin.author: jofra (@V_jofra)
plugin.name: Indirect branches setter
plugin.description: A plugin that eases setting undetermined indirect jump branches.
plugin.longdescription: This plugin allows you to easily set the indirect jump branches targets for a given indirect jump. This is helpful in situations where binja fails to identify jump tables. To fix this, previously you would have to use the python console, but with this plugin you can do it from a simple UI.
